title: merged v1.5.0 from visor-android (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.visorapp.visor)
message:
merged v1.5.0 from visor-android (https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=de.visorapp.visor)
- now using a native module to calculate YUV -> RGB bytes
- do not a scale a bitmap by creating a new one, just use a Matrix and Canvas.
- added some sounds and animations
changed app-id (to have both apps installed at the same time)
changed app name to "Visor OS"
updated gradle, android plugin (using android studio canary)

still many things to do, especially refactoring!

upcoming: hide control buttons with a gesture and may be a digital zoom

title: Increased performance for some devices. Using the original "camera preview" if…
message:
Increased performance for some devices. Using the original "camera preview" if no_filter is applied, which has a drastically performance boost.
Using a yuv to greyscale-rgb instead of jpeg-compression to have a lossless image as result and apply filters to the greyscaled bitmap.
Added a pause Button to the view to pause the camera preview. Additionally added the feature to switch color modes in paused mode.

title: Added an alternative way to receive a bitmap from the YUVImage. Works, its…
message: Added an alternative way to receive a bitmap from the YUVImage. Works, its greyscaled, but slow as the compressToJpeg. But the quality is much better!

message: Optimized performance slightly by increasing thread number.

title: increased image quality a bit
message: increased image quality a bit

title: added scaling for the resulting bitmap. works on my nexus5 but not on the nexus 10.
message:
added scaling for the resulting bitmap. works on my nexus5 but not on the nexus 10.
removed not needed variables and methods.

title: added filters for blue-yellow and yellow-blue. Tested it on low light conditions.
message: added filters for blue-yellow and yellow-blue. Tested it on low light conditions.

title: further decreased preview size.
message:
further decreased preview size.
implemented separate runnable for the bitmap processing.

title: added thread to compress YUV to jpeg and render the bitmap.
message:
added thread to compress YUV to jpeg and render the bitmap.
added our first real color filters by using a color matrix.
using a lower resolution instead of the maximum to enhance performance.
I added some test-classes too i.e. hte AsyncTask or the external ThreadClass for the Bitmap creation. They will be deleted if I've found an acceptable solution for the performance problem.

title: added BaseFilter with some general methods like setting contrast, color invert or greyscale.
message:
added BaseFilter with some general methods like setting contrast, color invert or greyscale.
modified filter interface - I'll now accept a ColorMatrix reference for further modifications.
added some test methods for the colorMatrix and Paint object to verify it works on my nexus5 (will be removed soon).

title: added onPreviewFrame handler to receive the byteArray and draw a Bitmap from it.
message:
added onPreviewFrame handler to receive the byteArray and draw a Bitmap from it.
In createBitmap we will store the decoded byte array bitmap in our member variable.
onDraw draws the image in its own matrix.
The result for now is a PIP live preview from the camera on the holder and also on top the bitmap generated matrix.

title: made auto-focus feature as optional for this app.
message: made auto-focus feature as optional for this app.

title: using all available color effect modes for the device.
message:
using all available color effect modes for the device.
also added elevation for color button
modified README.md and added support for talk-back

title: changed button description to be more specific. Added german strings.xml file for using TalkBalk.
message: changed button description to be more specific. Added german strings.xml file for using TalkBalk.

title: added some not-implemented classes as Color Filters.
message:
added some not-implemented classes as Color Filters.
removed some classes from android studio template
refactored the activity and view class
prepared some fields to be used for filtering, but I don't know really how to implement the filtering right now.

message: changed README with the description for the version 0.2

title: added some better looking buttons in a round shape. added icons from the material design.
message:
added some better looking buttons in a round shape. added icons from the material design.
added exception handling for runtimeException while setting new parameters for the color effect, because the nexus 10 still throws that exception at this point. (mono isn't supported)
made camera handling more stable and release it onDestroy - removed unnecessary lines in onSurfaceChanged.
added PreviewCallback Interface to handle the preview and apply some custom color modes (in the future) on it.

title: added detection for devices that don't support the color effect modes.
message: added detection for devices that don't support the color effect modes.

title: Initial commit for the app version 0.1. Including live camera preview, some…
